channel.title: Re: I gots a big question =\
channel.description: ok when i get to the moparscape login thing... well im pretty much stuck right there becouse i have no idea what to put in the account name and pass and i dont know a ip adress...so the question is, how do i get a username and pass and ip. im not really a expert (as you can tell) on this kind of stuff, actually i know almost nothing about it...so moparisthebest or some other genius please oh please help me i really do want to try moparscape becouse i saw a video of a guy with full dragon and hundreds of phats and i just wanted to feel what its like to be a person with that kind of stuff and ho wit look on me lol..btw im using the private client.[br][size=1]Posted at: April 18, 2006, 05:36:04 pm[/size][hr]Just so you know, when I try to connect (i use my noob runescape username and pass) and I try the servers on Runestatus.net that it says are open, it still says "error connecting to server" please help me someone I really want to play MoparScape.

item.title: Re: I gots a big question =\
item.dc:creator: @deraks deraks
item.description:
@deraks wrote:

ok thank you, that sort of helmped i just need to find a working ip and i dunno if i have a firewall, i dont think ive ever downloaded one.

Read full topic
item.source: Re: I gots a big question =\

item.title: Re: I gots a big question =\
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

Taylor:

[quote author=!!1one!eleven1! link=topic=1569.msg14661#msg14661 date=1145420844]
MoparScape is not a game, its a client which connects to a runescape clone server.

And if the IP is correct and you still cant connect maybe you have a firewall?

he talking moparscape, not mopar revolution. if the server has autoregister u can login. if not, goto their website[/quote]

... Read my message agian....

Read full topic
item.source: Re: I gots a big question =\

item.title: Re: I gots a big question =\
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

!!1one!eleven1!:

MoparScape is not a game, its a client which connects to a runescape clone server.

And if the IP is correct and you still cant connect maybe you have a firewall?

he talking moparscape, not mopar revolution. if the server has autoregister u can login. if not, goto their website

Read full topic
item.source: Re: I gots a big question =\

item.title: Re: I gots a big question =\
item.dc:creator: @masonw masonw
item.description:
@masonw wrote:

You don't need to use a real account's name. Go to the server development section abd find a server to connect to. They usualy have a website you go to to create an account.

Read full topic
